Queue: In this unit you are going to learn all about Queues, get basic understanding of their API and insight into their internals.

column2: Explanation: A Queue is not always related to Billard

A Queue, also called First In First Out (FIFO)-Queue, is a collection, where the newest element always is the lastItem. Think of it of people enqueuing themselves in a line, waiting to buy the new Diablo game.
It supports the operations enqueue: value to add an element to the queue and dequeue to retrieve the oldest element.
Implement a method which enqueues an item to the line
The push method is used to add an item on top of the stack, id est adds it as the first list element. Implement it!
Implement a method which dequeues the oldest item
Implement the dequeue method for the queue. It removes the oldest (=last) list element and returns it.
What can I do with a Q?
a => people waiting in a line, b => playing a card game, c => navy seals storming a house
